sentences.en: ‘Frances has left her husband, you know.’ ‘Oh, has she?’
sentences.cn: “你知道，弗朗西丝跟她丈夫分开了。”“哦，真的吗？”

sentences.en: "Could I have a word?" — "Oh dear, if you must."
sentences.cn: “我能说一句吗？”——“亲爱的，如果你非说不可的话，好吧。”

sentences.en: "How much is he paying you?" — "Oh, five thousand." —"Not bad."
"Oh, Gairdner," he said, as if that meant something to him.
sentences.cn: “哦，盖尔德纳，”他说道，好像他听说过这个名字。

sentences.en: "Oh, sorry. I forgot." — "Everyone forgets," the girl sighed.
sentences.cn: “哦，对不起，我忘了。”——“每个人都有忘事的时候，”那女孩叹着气说道。

sentences.en: "Oh, we'd love to!" cried Nancy, her face brightening.
sentences.cn: “哦，我们很乐意！”南希面露喜色，大声说道。

sentences.en: "Oh," he said carelessly. "I'm in no hurry to get back."
sentences.cn: “噢，”他漫不经心地说道，“我不急着回去。”

sentences.en: He goes to me: "Oh, what do you want?"
sentences.cn: 他问我：“哦，你想要什么？”

sentences.en: I've been here, oh, since the end of June.
sentences.cn: 我是，呃，6月底来到这里的。

sentences.en: Milk, cereal, juice – oh, and put lettuce on the list too.
sentences.cn: 牛奶、麦片、果汁——噢，把生菜也列到清单上。

sentences.en: Oh Boy! Just think what I could tell him.
sentences.cn: 哇，好家伙！想想看我会告诉他什么。

sentences.en: Oh God, you get so flaming worked up about everything.
sentences.cn: 哦，天哪，你总是这么激动，真该死。

sentences.en: Oh I'm not political, I take no interest in politics.
sentences.cn: 噢，我不关心政治，对政治一点也不感兴趣。

sentences.en: oh well, please yourself.
sentences.cn: 好吧，请便吧。

sentences.en: Oh, aren’t those flowers gorgeous!
sentences.cn: 呀，那些花可真漂亮！

sentences.en: Oh, how awful!
sentences.cn: 哎呀，真糟糕！

sentences.en: Oh, I didn’t know that.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，那我可不知道啊。

sentences.en: Oh, look, I think that’s Harry over there.
sentences.cn: 噢，你看，我想那边那个人是哈里。

sentences.en: Oh, no! I’ve left my keys in the car!
sentences.cn: 噢，坏了，我把钥匙落在车里了！

sentences.en: Oh, those books! I meant to put them away before this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 哦，那些书！我本来要在下午之前收起来的。

sentences.en: Oh, well, never mind.
sentences.cn: 噢，没关系。

sentences.en: She was instantly contrite. "Oh, I am sorry! You must forgive me."
sentences.cn: 她马上就懊悔了。“哦，我很抱歉！你一定要原谅我。”

sentences.en: Terry actually says "Oh, shucks!" when complimented on her singing.
sentences.cn: 人们赞誉她的歌声时，特里实际上会说“噢，没什么!”

sentences.en: The policeman smiled at her. "Pretty dog."— "Oh well, thank you."
sentences.cn: 警察冲她笑了笑，“这狗真漂亮。”——“哦，谢谢。”

words.tran_cn: 哦；哎呀（表示惊讶或恐惧等）

trans.tran_cn: （表示恐惧、惊讶、疑虑等）噢，啊，哎呀，冠于人名前，起呼语作用
trans.tran_en: used when you want to get someone’s attention or continue what you are saying
used to show that you are very happy, angry, disappointed etc about something
